overview.en: CTT is the utility token of CryptoTycoon, and it also plays the role of on-chain governance. In the game, CTT is an essential asset of the last step for players to become a tycoon. From the moment the CTT contract is written on the BSC, its total amount is fixed at 1 million, and each on-chain transaction of CTT will cause 5% of the transaction amount to be burnt.
overview.zh: CTT 是 CryptoTycoon 的用途型 Token，同时也兼具着链上治理的作用，在游戏中，CTT 是玩家成为大亨最后一步的必备资产。从写入 CTT 合约在 BSC 区块链上那一刻起，它的总量就固定为 100 万枚，同时进行 CTT 的链上转账将会销毁 CTT 转账额的 5%。
